name: Draw & GO
description: Draw & GO is a cross-platform application. It can help you automate all daily routine with your devices by recording and playing back macros using the graphical key.

name: SpeakUp
description: Video-voice control of your device on any language.

name: PickMeUp
description: Service, which can help you quickly get to the necessary destination.

name: Personal account for the travel agency
description: Order tours as a user or agent. Monitor all data as an admin.

name: Driver Assistance
description: The application allows you monitor the car speed and informs about the traffic signs. The OBD-adapter is required.

name: GallerySuite
description: All your media files in one place. View all your photos from Google Photos, Instagram, Facebook. The application is cross-platform and works on Android, iOS, tvOS. The website is available as well.

name: Continue On PC
description: iOS Safari Extension to continue browsing on Desktop
